name: obsidian-auto-resize-images
description: Automatically resizes linked images by adding |150 to image links

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.new-release: node version-bump.mjs --release && git add manifest.json versions.json && git commit -m "new release" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version") -m "new release"

author: Your Name
